QuestData.Title: Fel-Ravaged Tome
QuestData.Description: Much of the elven writing in the tome has been singed by fel fire.$B$BThe head of the curators in Dalaran is renowned for his restoration skills. Perhaps he can treat the tome to bring it back to legibility.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Fel-Ravaged Tome to Robert Newhearth in Dalaran.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Fel-Ravaged Tome to Robert Newhearth in Dalaran.
